Room.Name: The Beginner's Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small, subsection of the Melbourne Entertainment Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The Beginner's Circle provides young, less experienced warriors with the experience of killing off Oceancrest's criminals. Rather than take up space in prisons, the criminals are given a chance for freedom if they can survive in the ring with other warriors. Hardened criminals are thrown into the Center Circle.
